text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Sédhiou region | native_name = | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Sedhiou in Senegal.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of Sédhiou in Senegal | image_map1 = Map of the departments of the Sédhiou region of Senegal.png | map_alt1 = | map_caption1 = Sédhiou région, divided into 3 departments | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Senegal | established_title = Established | established_date = 2008 | parts_type = Départements | p1 = Bounkiling department | p2 = Goudomp department | p3 = Sédhiou department | p4 = | founder = | named_for = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Sédhiou | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Cheikh Kane Niane | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 7341 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 590,784 | population_as_of = 2023 census | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_density_rank = | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone = GMT | utc_offset = +0 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Sédhiou is a region in the southwest of Senegal. The regional capital is Sédhiou. It was created in 2008. As of the 2013 census, 434,877 people lived there. It has an area of . == Départements == There are three départements: * Bounkiling Département * Goudoump Département * Sédhiou Département Category:2008 establishments in Africa Category:Regions of Senegal
title: Sédhiou Region
